problem_text_cn: 如图,OA=OB=6cm,线段OB从与OA重合的位置开始沿逆时针方向旋转120°,在旋转过程中,设AB的中点为P(当OA与OB重合时,记点P与点A重合),则点P运动的路径长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, OA = OB = N_0, the line segment OB starts from the position where it coincides with OA and rotates anticlockwise by N_1. During the rotation, set the midpoint of AB as P (when OA and OB coincide, mark the point P and A coincides), then the path length of point P movement is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:根据题意得:点P运动的路径长是以O为圆心、半径为6cm、圆心角为60°的弧长,∴点P运动的路径长=\frac{60π×6}{180}=2π(cm),故选C.
